content: We have several exciting features lined up for launch following the Portal initiation. These include the #Catena Bridge, enabling seamless interoperability, and the new #Mainnet Staking Portal, which will facilitate staking activities for our community members.$CMCX #blockchainhttps://twitter.com/catena_network/status/1674467930531147811?s=46&t=SuUyIxo-8IPgdiq9zfGDww
